Package bio.singa.javafx.renderer.layouts.force

Class ForceDirectedGraphLayout<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​Vector2D,​IdentifierType>,​EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,​IdentifierType,​GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.javafx.renderer.layouts.force.ForceDirectedGraphLayout<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType,​GraphType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutRenderer<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType,​GraphType>
    public class ForceDirectedGraphLayout<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,​Vector2D,​IdentifierType>,​EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,​IdentifierType,​GraphType extends Graph<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements LayoutRenderer<NodeType,​EdgeType,​IdentifierType,​GraphType>
    This class tries to arrange a graph using force directed placement.
    The algorithm is based on Fruchterman, Thomas MJ, and Edward M. Reingold. "Graph drawing by force-directed placement." Softw., Pract. Exper. 21.11 (1991): 1129-1164.
    With some modifications.
